titleStmt.title: The danger of the errors of the rulers a sermon preached upon the tenth day of March 1661 at the Assizes for Staffordshire held at Wolver-Hampton / by Edward Powel.
titleStmt.author: Powel, Edward, fl. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Gilbertson and are to be sold by John Felton,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
